messages.subject: Crass Commercial Message - Books for Sale
messages.msgSnippet: All, I have listed several books for sale on Ebay. If anyone is interested, please take a look. Don t bother with the game unless you are really board :-)
messages.messageBody:
All, I have listed several books for sale on Ebay. If anyone is
